body:
Dear LB-HB Community,

Currently I am working on a base case model for my study. I am confused about a situation here. The model that I am working on is a South oriented, 5X5X3m office room with some assumptions that you can see at the attached image. For now, the space is not conditioned. I doubt about the interior temperature. Is there something wrong about my definition? Or is it normal because of the excessive glazing. I will further study the influence of shading geometry on thermal and visual comfort.

Your comments are more than welcome.

Best regards,
Mustafa [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/JomcnL50vYDmWspCYBpnPa1kyNmALLayiDmWkqsBiKPBBgGO7JF5*bop0B33T3q1RVFiYkIYAbB9KY63TBGhHBWAI8QbOQjr/Analysis_0.jpg)
topic: Inside temperature of a box model
